writerMutex - Variable in class com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text.StreamBasedTerminal
 
writeToTerminal(byte...) - Method in class com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text.StreamBasedTerminal
Allow subclasses (that are supposed to know what they're doing) to write directly to the terminal
Warning! Be sure to call this method INSIDE of a synchronize(writeMutex) block!!!
The reason is that many control sequences are a group of bytes and we want to synchronize the whole thing rather than each character one by one.

XTerm8bitIndexedColorUtils - Class in com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal
This class can help you convert to and from the 8-bit indexed color standard that is supported by some terminal emulators.
